DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine whether use triple antibiotic paste intracanal medication anti-inflammatory drug , compare calcium hydroxide reduce postoperative pain intracanal bacteria patient asymptomatic necrotic teeth .
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Triple Antibiotic Paste Intracanal Medication With Anti-Inflammatory Drug Post-Operative Pain Asymptomatic Uniradicular Necrotic Teeth .
DOC.detailed_description: This trial aim answer clinical question whether patient asymptomatic necrotic teeth , use triple antibiotic paste intracanal medication anti-inflammatory drug , compare calcium hydroxide , reduce postoperative pain intracanal bacteria ? trial design Randomized , control , double blind , unicenter , parallel , two-arm , superiority trial 1:1 allocation ratio .
DOC.mesh_term: Bacitracin zinc , neomycin sulfate , polymyxin B , drug combination
DOC.criteria: 1 . Subject 's age 1850 year . 2 . Both male female subject . 3 . Medically free healthy subject . 4 . Mandibular maxillary single root teeth . 5 . Asymptomatic non vital teeth . 1 . Teeth acute dentoalveolar abscess . 2 . Subjects one tooth require root canal treatment . 3 . Subjects take analgesic , antiinflammatory antibiotic drug 10 day prior start treatment . 4 . Pregnant female . 5 . Subjects systemic disease endocrine disease , Infectious disease Psychological disturbance . 6 . Teeth periodontal disease pulp calcification . 7 . Subjects take chronic pain medication .
